main event: An unidentified flying object, described as a bright orange disk, was observed over Crystal Beach, Texas, on August 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object was first seen hovering silently before moving downward while emitting light into the water below., The object appeared to cast illumination, and its movement resembled a crack opening in the sky., It was described as larger than a small airplane and remained stationary for a period., Other family members were aware and witnessed the sighting., The object was observed to pulsate and rotate, intensifying the witness's intrigue.
witness description: the witness was in bed, observing with family members nearby who were also awake
